<title level="1" right="Rules">[Rarity in Your Game](/Rules.aspx?ID=914)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 35</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The rarity system is a powerful tool that helps you and your group customize your story, your characters, and your world to better match your game’s themes and setting. You can also use it to keep the complexity of your game low by limiting access to unusual options.

 This section supplements the [Using Rarity and Access sidebar](/Rules.aspx?ID=492) on page 488 of the _Core Rulebook_.
</column>
